title: Really? Quinn nerfs? WHY?
body:
She sucks jg, cant bot like twitch, cant mid and TOP her only role and you are nerfing it? i mean... WHY?

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2017/02/222-pbe-update.html

replies.body:
for the sake of the general populace's intelligence

please let this be a troll bait post

> [{quoted}](name=Joxcab,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZVoyEtxx,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-23T06:18:21.194+0000)
>
> for the sake of the general populace's intelligence
> 
> please let this be a troll bait post

Sadlly when I saw "then why is yasuo not nerfed" on his following posts. I guess he is not.
God save us.

Quinn's winrate is 54%-57% in all regions lol

I think that might have something to do with it
so is Yasuo, why the nerf?

nah, how Quinn's kit is, if she doesnt delete her targets instantly like the Diver marksman that she is, shes useless, she was strong before the lethality update soo honestly, these nerfs to her E will not hurt her winrate..
Quinn is really oppressive as a roamer and a laner, especially against melees. If she gets ahead, she becomes basically unstoppable.

Because she has a huge win rate (I think the highest right now) and absurd burst for a ranged champion, not to mention good cc.

She is one of the champs that benefitted the most from lethality.
{{item:3814}} {{item:3142}} {{item:3147}} too strong on her (an almost all other ADs) so they nerf the champ instead of the items. Sad
nerf the champion instead of adressing the ITEMS
